title: Bitcoin Demand Booms in Ukraine and Russia
sub_head: The cryptocurrency has been trading at a premium against the Ukrainian hryvnia
body:
The Russian invasion of Ukraine has driven demand for cryptocurrencies in both countries, helping boost the price of bitcoin.
Bitcoin has been trading at a premium against the Ukrainian hryvnia on a number of exchanges, both globally and locally, a sign of high demand. On Binance, the largest exchange in the world, bitcoin was trading for the equivalent of $47,300 in hryvnia terms. On Kuna, the largest exchange in Ukraine, it was at $46,955, and had traded as high as $51,240.
